about_the_game:
Marionette Mates is a powerful pngtuber application with multiplayer support. Marionette Mates allows you to use the provided assets or ones you create as virtual avatars to create an online presence alone or with friends. Marionette Mates is best used with streaming software like OBS to chromakey out the background and have just your Mates on your stream or recording.

Features

Online Multiplayer - Play with up to 6 other friends at once!


Steam Networking - No port forwarding required.

Runtime Asset Loading - Use our website or share your local assets with friends and load images on the fly!

Synced Mates - Clients automatically use the host's mates when they connect. (Requires use of our website or a shared assets folder between the hosts and clients)

Editor Window - Customize your mate to your heart's content and when you're ready hit apply to make your changes visible to everyone.

Emotes - Set your Mate's default emotion when speaking.

Props - Use a variety of hats, wigs, accessories, and other props to customize your Mate.

name: Marionette Mates

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: potato
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-13600K, AMD Ryzen 5 5600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any Dedicated
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A microphone
